website_summaries.verdict: The Naztech i9 BT headphones feature active noise cancellation and both Bluetooth and wired connectivity, but audio performance is significantly lopsided.
pros: Delivers deep bass response without distortion
Can be used in wired or wireless modes, and noise cancellation can be switched off
cons: Noise cancellation is merely average and, when not activated, audio sounds wildly different

customer_reviews.title: Naztech quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product April 8th. It literally fell apart last night (9/13) while I was using my iPad. I have never dropped it and I always use the included case. The two small screws holding the head band together broke and the whole earpiece fell off (the speaker wire was the only thing left holding it. I'll spend the extra money to get one that will last more than 5 months!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Provencher

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones, however a bit of an issue with foam
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these headphones. I was looking for something over-ear, and these were less than $100. The NC isn't really true NC. This is my third pair of NC from different manufacturers, and its more of making the speakers louder. Same has been true of other manufacturers, so not an issue for me. I have big ears, so the headphone foam around the speaker is a little lacking. I just stuffed some rolled up packaging foam around the edge. This is so my ears don't touch the speaker. Other than these two minor issues, I couldn't be happier with the price point and purchase. Puts out wonderful quality music. Forward/Back buttons help, along with the volume control.
customer_reviews.author: JT_JUMPER

customer_reviews.title: Better than Dre Beats!! Cost effective. BEST BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesomr product. Great noise canceling. Crisp, Clear, Quality sound. Great battery life, very comfortable for extended wear. Well built, solid connections with a good weight. No cheap plastic feel. Nice braided wire connection option when battery dies or whenever you want to save battery life. Clear bluetooth sound. Bad: Bluetooth distance is very short. Maybe 4 to 7 feet. This was no wear close to what they claim but not a deal breaker for me. I keep my cell phone close and my laptop usually right in fron of me. So i love these.
customer_reviews.author: Mmayo10

customer_reviews.title: A lot to like...
customer_reviews.text: I actually like just about everything about this product. I'm a frequent traveler, but I also run a large riding lawn mower and a skid loader on the weekends. The noise-cancelling element of these headphones is fantastic! My biggest complaint is that this has USB-micro charging. It's a pain to have a different cord for every device. If it had USB-C, it would be virtually perfect. I wrote to the company to inquire about USB-C capabilities in alternative products/upgrades and received the most ridiculous form-letter response, so it's clear that customer service is not their thing. Overall, I'd recommend this product, particularly at the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn E. Pauly

customer_reviews.title: Great in the beginning and then slowly fell apart
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones (not an audiophile but I can tell between good headphones and really bad ones). And they lasted me two years, but the construction was poor, and the volume was an issue, where you couldn't hear music unless the noise cancelling was on. Mine slowly started following a part, where there were minor breaks and pieces missing, then I was unable to adjust the headphones without the wiring of the earpiece showing. I never dropped them, or mishandled them, they just fell apart. Then eventually, the ear pieces just broke of. I ultimately got my money's worth but they are good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Louis

customer_reviews.title: Too big and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were too big for starters. I have a fully developed cranium and these did not get small enough to ensure a secure fit. Second, these are more on ear, than around ear. My ears don't stick out farther than the next, but within 30 minutes of wear they hurt my ears, within an hour it was excruciating. I'm glad I wore them before I made my trans-Atlantic flight. They do have some pros though, soft earcups, great build quality of the cables, and a sturdy case. Sound quality was ok, I returned these quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew N.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with price/performance of this Headset!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and works great - a lot better than my last set of wireless head phones. I dont have experience with other noise canceling head sets, but the noise canceling seems to work well for me - I have an aquarium in my office and I don't hear it while wearing this headset. Not an audiophile either but the sound is great. The package is nice and the accessories are great as well- though a longer charging cord would have been nice. Set up was a snap on my devices though my PC bluetooth adapter took some time to configure - but that was more the adapter drivers than the headset. Happy with price/performance!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Tackett

customer_reviews.title: Good buy if you have a small head
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Ear cushions are comfortable - Good sound for the price - Various on headset controls Cons: - ONLY BUY THIS IF YOU HAVE A SMALL HEAD. The headband is designed in a 'sleek' way, but in reality the only contact point of these head phones is on the sides of my head and not the top. It is a VERY strange and distracting feeling. They went for a design element that truly takes away from the enjoyment of the product. - Noise cancelling sounds more 'tinny' than others I've tried. I get it you have to boost trebble in this mode (since noise cancelling really only works for low frequency) , but it goes a little too far.
customer_reviews.author: Entropy

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are very nice headphones, much nicer than I was expecting. Excellent to use via bluetooth, reasonably good noise cancellation, comfortable to wear. I typically have issues wearing over the ear headphones like these for much more than an hour, but I've been wearing them for three hours now and they're still comfortable. Sound quality is good for the cost. For the price point, these are probably some of the best headphones you can get if you're also looking for bluetooth and noise cancellation.
customer_reviews.author: Jon and Nicki

customer_reviews.title: I like the performance and battery life and the ANC was ...
customer_reviews.text: Since I spend every day in front of a computer screen at work, I spend hours listening to streaming radio each day while I work. Because of this, long term comfort is very important. I like the performance and battery life and the ANC was good, however the cups are not deep enough for my ears so they quickly become uncomfortable for me. That is the reason for 4 instead of 5 stars. I gave them to my wife and they fit her much more comfortably. If you have large or stick-out ears you may want to pass on these.
customer_reviews.author: GossFamilyColGA

customer_reviews.title: Don't do Europe without them.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. During the fifteen hours each way on a plane to and from Europe, these were a sanity saver. With Noise Limit on it was amazing to listen to the silence. I can't tell you about the db's or percentages, but these were very comfortable. Comes with the plug for the airplane. Three movies, an audiobook and a ton of my own saved songs made it easy.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy Bob

customer_reviews.title: GREAT sound and very clear bass!!!  Way to go!
customer_reviews.text: First time buying this type of headset. I LOVE THEM! they truly have a great sound, and they look very cool. I started listing to classic music which I never had the patient for. They do a great job if you are not welling to pay over $350 for BOSS. I just wanted something to enjoy without breaking the bank. Great item If you find this tip helpful, please indicate below so others can benefit as well.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick  Zerarka

customer_reviews.title: I love these Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these Headphones. I work in a cubical farm and the noise and distractions are huge. With people and conversation all-round me it made it tough to concentrate the tasks I was trying to complete. These headphones provides my own little "Cone of silence" or if desired the audio overlay with the noise cancelation makes for a crystal clear music experience. comfortable enough for an entire day wear ability. It kind of like having my own personal mute button on the environment around me. Seamless hookup on Windows 10, still trying to solve the Windows 7 compatibility. But with the aux cord, I plug in and I am back in my "Cone of Silence".
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ashton

customer_reviews.title: The sound is there but not the comfort.
customer_reviews.text: They sound great. Very impressed as compared to others I have had. No boomy bass kind of on the lines of the Bose headphones. Well tuned for a 67 year old ears. The downside is that I cannot wear them for more than an hour then they began pressing the ears. I can continue to adjust them to squeeze out another hour but after that they are hard to live with. I will continue you to use them until I can find the sound and conform I am looking for.
customer_reviews.author: SCQUE

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for work and travel. I don't use the noise canceling very often, so battery life is fantastic. Noise canceling was really nice for my recent plane trips. Only real complaint is that where the left earpiece extends started coming apart after about a month, so it occasionally falls out. I've got it taped together and it holds well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Got to headset for long trips
customer_reviews.text: used these on a 11 hour flight to Europe and didn't have any issues with fit or noise. This was the first time I didn't get a headache from the noise of the plane. I was able to use them with my phone and the planes built in sound system. These are now my go to headset.
customer_reviews.author: JayF

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth connectivity is easily interferred with
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for use when mowing my lawn on a riding mower. The bluetooth connection seems to work fine until you start up the mower deck and then it starts getting all sorts of interference. Thankfully these shipped with optional cables so that I can at least mow my lawn in peace. The noise cancellation itself isn't the best available, but it is sufficient enough to significantly reduce the noise from the mower deck so that I can listen to my music while mowing.
customer_reviews.author: N. Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones ive ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I'll start this off with the fact that I've never used Audiophile grade headphones, or even heard a true audiophile system, out of all the headphones I've used ranging in price from $10 to $200 these have the best sound quality, noise canceling is way more than expected from the description and I have been using these now for 3 days without having to recharge them, the only negative I've found is that the mic only appears to be used for the active noise cancelling mode and I was looking for a wireless headset to replace my gaming headset
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Save your money or consider yourself warned!!
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased in May 2016 to be used specifically for work. Less than six months later the left ear piece broke, and shortly thereafter the right ear piece broke. You can see from the photos that the plastic on the interior is cracked and will be continue deteriorating soon. All this said, these were never handled outside of my office and never once left my desk, never exposed to rough handling, and never handled by anyone other than myself. They were stored in a drawer at all times when not in use. Save your money or consider yourself warned!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Jones

customer_reviews.title: Brittle hinges, cheap plastic, little flexibility when removing/putting on
customer_reviews.text: The headphones fail to meet minimum build quality standard. The left and right ears extend down, but the adjusting bracket is made of plastic and does not flex sufficiently to allow the headphones to be placed on a head and removed. The two-screw clamps that indicate the Left and Right ears suffer from this same structural flaw. They flex apart every time you put the headphones on and take them off. I have owned these for four years and used them for less than 30 hours total. I took them apart just now and I finally understand why they have been broken since the first year of ownership. I do not recommend these to anyone for any reason.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a couple of months and I just can't complain about this product. I travel a lot this headphones are one of my best investments. Sound quality is great. More like unbelievable for this price. The sound cancelation is great. I compare this to top of the line base and beats. Comfort and sound quality is very close. For this price I will always for for this. Sound is crisp and base is great. The sound quality is fantastic with acoustics music, to hip hop, to house. It gets really loud and sound does not distort in any way. I have been recommending this to other Road Warriors. All accessories come with the device.
customer_reviews.author: Rosh

customer_reviews.title: Not a Bose enthusiast, but these really do not compare for the price
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth feature was really nice, but the noise canceling quality just doesn't compare to Bose. I hoped to use these while studying without playing music, but they don't cancel out many sounds at all. Bose is significantly more than I wanted to spend, but ultimately felt the difference was worth the expense after trying a pair in a store. The pair of Naztechs I was shipped were also dirty and obviously returned by someone else. I would not purchase any Naztech products again. Overall a very disappointing product, but Amazon customer service was great in returning the item for me.
customer_reviews.author: pompouspickle

customer_reviews.title: Everything promised & advertised - Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: They're comfortable, sound great, battery lasts a long time, and are very versatile. They tend to sound better with the noise cancelling turned on (more highs) but they sound fine without as well. They do a great job of cancelling out my office. I can still hear nearby and loud people, but 85% or more of the office is gone now, which is why I bought these. They come with a snazzy case, braided audio cord, USB charge cable, and adapters for dual port and large port connections. Headset (call) testing worked flawlessly and I was able to be heard while talking normally. I am very pleased; would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jake P

customer_reviews.title: Good warranty backing
customer_reviews.text: The first pair quit working after a couple of trips. I contacted Naztech, the rep was very nice but the was a miscommunication in how to return them so I waited weeks for an RMA number. When I wrote about my experience in the review, a service rep contacted me to help. She was very helpful in getting the defective item returned and saw to it that the new headphones were delivered. I haven't had a chance to try the new set, yet, but I'm happy to have my problem resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Buckner

customer_reviews.title: Not for long term, everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: I found this unsatisfactory as after four to six months of continuous wear I noticed that the pleather started to flake off and the plastic start to crack where the earpieces were being held. I fixed the broken plastic after both sides broke and there was only a wire holding it together. I finally had to stop using them after about one year because the plastic that curved out from the extension area started to crack also. This was after continuous use, nearly every day.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Good Value, Nice Sound
customer_reviews.text: These are exceptionally nice headphones for the price; they're comfortable, have reasonably good sound quality, and the Bluetooth works well and connects easily. To explain the four-star rating, they do have a few shortcomings, including the too-small control buttons on the left earpiece, and a very noticeable difference in the mid- to upper-range sound when the noise cancellation is turned on or off. (With cancellation off, the volume goes down and the treble goes flat.) It's all pretty minor stuff though, and I wouldn't hesitate to buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: LFO50

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but if you want noise cancellation and good sound qualtiy in the same pakage go with the premium Bose
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancellation was better than expected (not as good as Bose, but probably about 70% as good on noise cancellation), but there was an electrical hum some of the time. But the reason for the 3 stars is the sound quality is not very good when you turn on the noise cancellation (better if noise cancellation is off, but others may have a different opinion depending if they like more base or more treble as the base goes mostly away when the noise cancellation is turned on) which is where a premium product like Bose stands out.
customer_reviews.author: beameup

customer_reviews.title: My honest opinion
customer_reviews.text: First let me say these where packaged very good. The case is very nice and protects the headphones very well. The headphones are very light weight and very comfortable, I can wear these for hours on end with no problems. The noise canceling function is awesome it does reduce noise around you without music but this function really comes in strong when your playing music through them. The sound is very crisp and clean not to bass heavy but will vibrate if you play bass heavy music. Quality is great and I am very pleased with the sound and build quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Students
customer_reviews.text: I'm a medical student who is very picky about ambient noise while studying - I use these headphones plugged in through the provided cable to my laptop and run white noise and I absolutely cannot hear background noise at all. The sound quality is also very good! The noise-cancelling tech is almost as good as other headphones I have used which are three times as expensive. My only complaint is that the Bluetooth is a little spotty at times if you use the headphones wirelessly and your phone is more than a few feet from them.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Persampiere

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy pairing, but aggravating skips
customer_reviews.text: First, they are very comfortable and easy to pair. But the music kept skipping. There was no rhyme or reason. I could be just a few feet from my device and I would still get skips. It did not matter if I was sitting perfectly still or jumping up and down. The skipping was extremely aggravating. This was the second head phone that I tried. I was hoping that the first one was just defective. Well, it wasn't. They both performed equally bad. I want a pair of head phones but I now don't know what to get.
customer_reviews.author: sewsam

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money, don’t buy these headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after a lot of research. What a waste of money! I used them on an international trip and they worked well. They then waited in my luggage for almost a year, getting ready for my next trip I charged them and headed off. They worked for an hour then the battery was dead. At my destination I charged them and they then had a loud bee like buzzing sound. They haven’t worked since. The people at Noise Hush do not respond to my emails, Amazon says they can’t help me. A total waste of money and time, don’t buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Janzen

customer_reviews.title: These are ON ear head phones, not over ear. But otherwise pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: The description and title are misleading. These headphones are ON ear headphones, not over ear. Over ear implies that the speaker encapsulates your ear and the padding sits on your skull area around the ear. Those head phones DO NOT do that. These headphones sit on your ears; so like any on ear headphone, they get uncomfortable after long periods. Otherwise, they are a quality product; sound reproduction is good and the noise cancelling is standard (not total silence but noticeably more quiet.)
customer_reviews.author: berklaw

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, NOT  DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: The sound is OK on these headphones but the plastic and design is absolutely, positively not. The warranty is worthless because you pay for shipping (going and coming) an handling. After about 4 months the part holding the earpiece to the headband broke. I called and called and...called and finally I got instructions on how to pay for it to be fixed. The cost to fix them was $21.40 and the cost was $89.99. Most of the other 1 star ratings are for the same reason, check it out. They have a problem and they should fix it at no cost to the consumer. If this was a good company they would issue a recall.
customer_reviews.author: MHS

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is good and the noise cancelling works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well! Has decent bass (better than Bose in my opinion). Battery life is good and the noise cancelling works well. I bought this used like new and I've had no problems. The sound goes up when you turn on noise cancelling, and the base also seems to get better as well. Bluetooth connects well. I had a little skipping every now and then but not often (mainly when in another room). In all very happy I choose these over Bose! Saved a-lot of money. Carrying case is good and the same size as Bose's carrying case. Note: They still have that pressure feeling that all noise cancelling over ear headphones have but not as much in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a good quality, comfortable pair of noise cancelling headphones without spending $300+. These definitely fit the bill. My primary use of them is on flights and they work very well for drowning out background noise. When using them in other environments i agree with many of the other reviewers. There is a distinct difference in sound between the noise cancellation being on and off. I personally prefer having it on which helps boost the highs. They can sound a little muddy with noise cancellation off. Quality of construction seems good for the money and the accessories that come with them are very complete. Overall I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Poe

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! We have two kids, a very active 3 year old and a 3 month old, and my husband is able to work in the house without being distracted. I use it when I want to read and barely can hear the commotion in my house. Also great for the airplane. Can listen to music/movies without hearing the engine. Customer Service is great as well. No problems if you need to exchange or return. You can't beat the price for what you get. Already have recommended it to a friend who works from home.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mala

customer_reviews.title: Audio sounds much better to me with Boise cancelation turned to ON
customer_reviews.text: There is a notable difference between the audio quality when listening to music over Bluetooth or over the audio jack.. I should say I'm using a iPhone 6s+. Not sure if the phone has much to do with the quality loss, so please do your homework. Audio sounds much better to me with Boise cancelation turned to ON.. I use these with my HTC Vive VR HMD and love them very much.. These have completely replaced my Logitech G930. The noise cancellation is fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Russ brogan

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, Poor craftsman ship, Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Good Sound, Good noise canceling, Comfortable. But.... Poor joint construction and horrible customer service. The joint on the right side broke after about 5 months of light use. Getting warranty service was quite an ordeal. Apply for a Return Authorization, ship it to them myself within 10 days. They then promptly forgot about it for 2 months, and I had to write to them to ask on the status. Got another unit. It lasted 2 months before it began to buzz when Bluetooth is in use (loose connection grounded?). I can not recommend. May 2016 model of i9.
customer_reviews.author: Lobos Actual

customer_reviews.title: On-Ear.  Not very quiet
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were packaged great and seem to be high quality. They paired with bluetooth fine and sound fine as well. I returned these headphones because: 1: They are not really over the ear headphone like they are branded. They actually sit on the ear lobe making them uncomfortable after about an hour of wear. and 2: I was disappointed with the noise cancelling function. With the noise cancelling on and music playing at a reasonable volume I could hear coworkers' conversations clearly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rawding

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite headphones
customer_reviews.text: First impression was very good looking headphones. Materials looks good quality, the case also. Very easy to use with my tablet and cellphone. I tested the sound quality with songs recorded in very good quality (mp3), and the bass and treble is outstanding. Be careful if you use low quality mp3 because could think that headphones are not good, but have an excellent quality using with good mp3 files. Recently I made many trips by airplane and the noise cancellation performance was very good, reducing the external noise around 90%. Another good feature is that use rechargeable battery, so I don't need to buy batteries all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Moises

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok for a few months, then inexplicably the sound became extremely distorted one day and now these are unusable. It seems as though there is some kind of electrical problem with the headphones but there is no return/replacement policy or factory warranty. I treated these very lightly and they never left my workdesk, so there was no issue with the wear-and-tear of transportation. If you don't want to have to buy a new pair of headphones every few months then do yourself a favor and get a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: this is a very comfortable and great sounding pair of Noise Cancelling headphones
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for travel on airplanes to reduce the engine noise. They do that very well. If you are not in a noisy environment though and switch between Noise Cancellation and non Noise Cancellation mode, you can tell a difference in the way the music sounds. If I were an audiophile, this would bother me. Since I am not, I can live with it. For the money, this is a very comfortable and great sounding pair of Noise Cancelling headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B.

customer_reviews.title: ... for over a month now and I am very happy with the comfort and quality of these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for over a month now and I am very happy with the comfort and quality of these headphones, they are actually large enough to cover my ears (think big) and the noise cancelling works beautifully, With NC on and playing music I'm getting 14 hours of usage between charges at work. The range on them is only about 15 feet from the host music player but that's about the best for any Bluetooth device anyway.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: High quality headphones at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Received a pair for Christmas and I love them! They are extremely comfortable and the sound quality is very good. My brother owns a couple pair of beats headphones and I think they are comparable in sound. I have been using them to watch movies and tv shows on my iPad and have not had any trouble with connecting through Bluetooth. If you aren't interested in spending hundreds of dollars on Bose or beats but still want a pair of awesome headphones then these are a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: StephMc

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair sound cuts out  - WOULD NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair: still charging since 1/17 BUT - constant sound cut outs when moving or turning head w/ connected device less than a foot away. Sound also cuts out when on laptop...? WOULD NOT RECOMMEND 1rst pair: Will not charge anymore - dead under 1 year. Did fit well and stayed on for gym activity. Sound is good but the non noise cxl'ing mode has terrible audio quality. Connecting with a cable with mini jack had a constant low hum.
customer_reviews.author: roy batty

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones for the money.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones, I have used for the money spent. The noise cancellation is very good. The battery life is superb. I have had these for awhile now and the padding for your ears is just as as soft as the day I bought them. It is not degrading or ripping or tearing. The bluetooth works without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis H.

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service STINKS
customer_reviews.text: poor man's Bose. not bad for mone, certainly not BOSE quality but then price point reflects that. But when mine stopped charging and I tried to enforce warranty.....fughttetaboutit. They did un gatz..nuttin. Not even reply. Thank you Amazon for backing your fullfillment policy. Do yourself a favor...spend another $150 and get the Gold standard, BOSE. These people make a decent product ant a decent price but when you ignore me.. well....scherzi con il toro che hai le corna. Va fa Napoli Naztech!
customer_reviews.author: John K. Conzone

customer_reviews.title: These headphones felt like a vice on me
customer_reviews.text: These headphones felt like a vice on me. The ear cups made my ears raw after half an hour of use. My ears burned for hours after use. Also, the noise canceling was a bit odd. I bought these because the upstairs neighbors suffer from chronic rudeness. I can hear constant hard walking, so I needed something to help block out that kind of noise. The funny thing: the lower thuds somehow were picked up into the headphones and exaggerated the noise. It was more startling using the headphones than without. I picked up a different brand locally. They are more comfortable and noise canceling works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: mmmark

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and fragile. Bluetooth unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: Had these around five months. First the cord to connect to devices had the felt split for some odd reason. Then the 3.5 connection broke in the headphones so can only use Bluetooth now. Music sounded fine and noise canceling is adequate but with Bluetooth the sound from music cuts out several times a day during continuous use. Once in a while get a loud noise all of sudden that makes me jump again on Bluetooth. Didn't think I had to treat it like it was made of glass. Will not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: April Patterson

customer_reviews.title: I would like to see the slide switch control everything
customer_reviews.text: These worked as advertised. The sound quality is greatly improved when the noise cancelling is turned on. I would like to see the slide switch control everything, much easier to find when you have this head set on your head. All in all, for a less expensive noise cancelling headset, I would recommend these as the quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: DaveR

customer_reviews.title: Average quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphone are about average and priced fairly. The Bluetooth is what you would expect and quality is good. The active noise canceling is slightly lacking. It cancels high pitch noise but mid and low range seem unaffected, also a slight hiss. The noise canceling circuit also boosts the high range of the input signal this may be undesirable. The bass doesn't clip on high volume but does seem slightly distorted at all levels through direct input and Bluetooth. However the bass is noticeable. This product pulls a solid 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dean R Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones! Very comfy when you wear them and the padding is very soft. I do a lot of traveling and I needed good noise cancelling headphones to watch movies and shows. Battery life is excellent and the sound quality is superb. The price is also unbeatable for the quality and functionality. I certainly did not want to spend hundreds of dollars on the name brand noise cancelling headphones. Apt-X sound quality is awesome and works great. On my tablet and phone there is a Bluetooth indicator on the that lets you know much battery is remaining which is also a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Hector 2.0

customer_reviews.title: Good noise cancellation for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife for a series of flights across the states, to Europe, in Europe, and back. The battery held up the whole time on a single charge! The headphones are comfy, and the noise cancellation is good! I personally preferred the Monoprice 10010s overall, so I went with those. But she was very happy with these. I will say this: the headband is much more comfortable on these, and the noise cancellation is just about as good as the Monoprice set.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for ADD
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! I already bought a second set for work; the noise canceling makes my office drop away and all I hear is my music. I have ADD and by shutting out externals these allow me to focus on what I need to accomplish. I even bought a set for my dad to tune out the noise of the airplane and passengers when he flies.
customer_reviews.author: Kalita Baumann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product! Makes the noise bearable - it is so muted. Can still hear a little - but feel much calmer about it. Eliminates most of the noise so I can relax and focus on whatever I need to do. Glad I got it! I can eliminate virtually all the noise by wearing these headphones and then using a "white noise" device - such as turning on my air purifier or kitchen stove fan. Love these earphones! They came in a strong, streamlined case too! Should last for years!
customer_reviews.author: Sparklefish

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable on the ears and much better than my old ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two pairs and used for 10 hours flights to Europe and back. Very comfortable on the ears and much better than my old Sony Noise Canceling headphones. I did forget to charge the them while in Europe and heard a weird hissing noise early on into my return flight from Europe. It took me some time to figure out they needed charged. After plugging into the airplane seats USB they worked fine again. Noise cancelling is better than my old Sony's and the sound quality appears to be much better as well. Overall great value!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Solid and for the price Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for travel and more specifically air travel. When not travelling I prefer something lighter. The unit has good sound cancellation. Pretty good sound and good battery life. The fit gets hot and uncomfortable for me after a bit and a bit of pressure on the outside of the earpiece can cause minor crackling. My biggest gripe is the volume overall should be higher. To be fair I could just be getting a bit deaf.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Dykhuis

customer_reviews.title: Band is awkward..
customer_reviews.text: Overall an okay experience. The plastic bell-shaped band was awkward - it did not feel like it fit the way it was supposed to. I think it was designed to form better to your head, but unfortunately we all have different-sized noggins - mine was a tad large to fit comfortably while my wife's was too small. The ANC is okay - not quite to par with other similarly-priced options I have tried, but not the worse either. I returned due to lack of comfort with the band.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality at first
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful quality at first, loved the features and comfortabilities. Great for glasses wearers. After about three months however, the wiring inside the head-strap began to make a whining noise, sort of like a feedback between the wires. Not sure what the issues is, but have to mess with the positioning to get it to go away.
customer_reviews.author: Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of ANC headphones
customer_reviews.text: Overall a nice pair of headphones for the price. Bluetooth pairs easily and works well and the ANC is very good. The sound quality with the ANC is very good however it does sound muted and not as crisp with the ANC turned off. This should not be an issue as the idea is to use both the wireless and noise canceling functions together. The build quality is good and the included case is a very nice touch for this price point. I look forward to taking these on my business trips without the worry of losing my expensive Bose QC 15s.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: great for mowing
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my riding mower and I think it works very well for the money. This isn't ear plugs but wow, it still works quite well. Sweating does not interfere and the battery life lasts for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Sole

customer_reviews.title: Changing my opinion
customer_reviews.text: So I used them about 5 times, the last time I took them off, the plastic clip connecting the slider rail broke. Just took the off and that was it, done. I liked the sound of them when they worked, did a great job of allowing me to not hear the jet engine on the plane, so that was good as well. One other uncomfortable thing about these, when I wore them around my neck they felt super tight and uncomfortable. Since these are my first pair of n/c headphones, I will be curious as to where there is similar discomfort with the replacement headphones I just purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W

customer_reviews.title: The noise cancelling is great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for listening to my TV when my wife is sleeping. I use a Bluetooth transmitter() to listen to TV programs. The Noise cancelling is the best I have ever heard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All the features are excellent, the cords and case that come with are ...
customer_reviews.text: All the features are excellent, the cords and case that come with are lovely and feel fancy, but the structure of the headphones themselves are really narrow. The pads fit over my (notably small) ears fine, but the head band is super tight and squishes my temples to an uncomfortable degree. I suppose there is a chance it could loosen up overtime, but I will likely return these and get a more adjustable set. TL;DR They squeeze my head
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and the price, But I would be happier if they make the profile little slimmer as i feel it to be little bulky when worn. But AMAZING!!!! product for the price. Bought it for my trip overseas and my 15hr plane ride sound is good not great but good and ANC is good as well i had a very peaceful sleep as i didn't not hear to much except a humming sound in the back ground but I was satisfied with the product and will definitely recommend everyone to try it..
customer_reviews.author: R. Thadhani

customer_reviews.title: right on the money
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The headphones feel light but sit comfortably on the head and don't slide off. The sound is pretty good. Noise-cancelling could be better, but it does work and it helps me study while people nearby have TV on. I was able to hook it up to 3 different devices: a phone, Mac, and a PC and it was pretty simple to do. Overall, pretty good for the money it cost.
customer_reviews.author: Ulyana Kulish

customer_reviews.title: What a let down. (Broken after 3rd use.)
customer_reviews.text: Very Disappointed. At first I thought these were a great deal, sound is above average and active-noise cancelling works great, however the construction quality just isn't there. I only use these for airline travel, so I have only pulled them out of the case 3 times (used ONLY 3 times*) and on my 3rd outbound flight the plastic hinge broke. Now they are totally useless after, technically *2.5 times used. Totally disappointed. Hopefully NAZTECH will make good on this flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product...but the volume isn't as loud as I thought it would be...as far as noise canceling...not quite..I can still hear sorroundings...not sure if good or not...or if it's on purpose, to save your hearing... thanks but I prefer to choose that my self...I'm so genoures still I kept set..looks cool and versatile...thanks...
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase so far
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and sound is good for the price. Packaging is clever (folds in nicely with a secure strap and detachable netted pouch for cables in hard case). Everything worked fine out of the box, and first test with the noise canceling (tuning out a loud refrigerator) worked fine. Headband is angled so that it will not interfere with reclining on a plane (nice extra) and they are pretty stylish. Have not taken them long distance yet, so cannot comment on battery and long-term comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Ain't Nobody

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good phones, great value. Pros: Very good sound (apt-X codec seems to make a difference,) active noise cancellation works as well as any I've used, including Sony and Bose, Bluetooth 4.1 helps with connection stability. Good build quality. Cons: Headband is a little tight for my head. This may loosen up over time but in the early days is somewhat uncomfortable. It's hard to find the forward/reverse/pause buttons when they're on your head. Manufacturer should pay a little more attention to ergonomics. Overall, these are a good value, compare to headphones costing $100 more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I used them for 5.5 hours on a flight to and from Maui and they sounded great and kept on going. I love how they dampen all the air plane noise but you can still talk to the people around you, and even hear them better then if you had them off. I haven't had a chance to use the microphone yet, but I plan to give it a shot the next time I game.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gard

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product - I use it for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product - I use it for sleeping, synched up to an iPhone sleep app. This is my second pair - the first broke after a while (one of the plastic pieces that holds the earphones snapped away) - which is the only reason I gave it four stars rather than five. But I bought another one because the sound muffling qualities are great, and - best of all - it has a rolling volume control (the only one I found like it). When you're half asleep, and the "white noise" is either too soft or too loud, that is the best/easiest type of UI to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: KevinK

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: The headphones themselves are great, and the noise cancelling function works wonderfully. What I really dislike though is the plastic connector piece -- the piece that connects on the sides of the headphones and allows you to adjust it and swivel to fit your head. It is a cheap plastic that chips, cracks, and breaks easily. I have had these headphones for about 6 months, only with normal to light use, and these connectors have completely broken off. I've had to use superglue to hold it together, which means I can no longer adjust the fit, making them quite uncomfortable to wear. This one flaw drastically reduces the lifetime of these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Moore

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: + The noise canceling works pretty well. - The band is uncomfortable. Where the band points out digs into my head and gets more and more uncomfortable over time. - Mic didn't work very well (this might be a defect with the one I got)
customer_reviews.author: QP M

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these in August, 2016. After a ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in August, 2016. After a few months of use, I noticed hairline cracks starting to form where the earpieces connect to the headband. Today, the earpiece snapped. They lasted 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Great noise cancelling and build
customer_reviews.text: Great noise cancelling and build. However the headphones do feel like it's squeezing my head after prolonged usage. It's not a type of headphones that you could wear all day. Excellent battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Aswin A.

customer_reviews.title: A high value, low cost alternative to Bose
customer_reviews.text: These are really excellent for the price. I have had two Bose headsets; both broke and had to be repaired - to their credit Bose did so at a nominal charge. What I like are: sound quality, comfort and battery life. The sound is excellent, good deep bass and crisp highs. They are SO comfortable. I have charged them once in six (6) days and my phone is still reporting 70% battery. Amazing. Last, considering these are 1/3 the price of Bose they are a fantastic value
customer_reviews.author: Russ Aldrich

customer_reviews.title: Nice, crisp sound
customer_reviews.text: Nice, crisp sound. I'm not having the squeaking noises others have mentioned. So far I've used them at home; I purchased to use them when I fly overseas in a few months. The headset could be a little snugger; they seem to be made for a larger head. As with other reviews I noticed that where the headset attaches to the earphones seems a bit delicate; I'm quite aware so take care that I don't fling them about. They are light weight and are easy to connect to my phone and laptop. Happy with the sound quality so far...
customer_reviews.author: lc

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the money
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are great for the price. The Noise Reduction is not as good as others I have tried; however, you get what you pay for. One thing I am somewhat sad about was that the noise reduction only truly only lasted like 7 hours rather than the battery time the description of the product stated. I would still buy it for the price though, good buy.
customer_reviews.author: WYSIWIG70

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, especially for the price, but microphone doesn't work well.
customer_reviews.text: The Naztech i9 work great, the sound is really good, strong and clear - as long as the noise cancellation is turned on. When it's off, the sound is weak and flat in comparison. Taking these on flights or even at work is a real treat. The only issue I have with them is the extremely low quality of the microphone, which prevents using them for calls.
customer_reviews.author: Eyal Gurevitch

customer_reviews.title: The sound was good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: We fully charged the headphones before the first use. Each of the next few uses got shorter and shorter before needing a recharge. After about 5 weeks they were of no use at all. I would not recommend these for quality reasons. The sound was good while it lasted. The fit and finish are nice. Finding the on/off buttons can be a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Brian  Sponaugle

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money paid!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound, noise cancelling that really works! I like the noise cancelling works off the same rechargeable batteries. I took 1 star off as the controls on the phones have a bit more of a learning curve then other headphones I own. Also, the phones do not fold up, good in its one less thing to wear out, but bad in it doubles the storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E. Melle

customer_reviews.title: The product works great and the headphones are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The product works great and the headphones are comfortable, BUT when using the bluetooth wireless function (the main reason I got them) I am getting static or interference sporadically. I emailed customer service and they told me to unpair and pair the headpones again. I figured that wouldn't do anything and sure enough after a few hours without problems the static returned. I had a wireless pair of in ear headphones before this and never heard static once before I lost them. I'm hoping I just got stuck with a bad pair, there is no way they are supposed to operate like this.
customer_reviews.author: Sheth

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are good noise-canceling, bluetooth headphones. The bluetooth works great so I have no complaints there. The noise-canceling feature, however, isn't fantastic. My husband has a pair of Bose noise-canceling headphones, and frankly, there's no comparison. The noise-canceling on the Bose is far superior. Overall, though, for the price, these are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones, the noise cancelling works very well, they are super comfortable. I was wary of ordering simply because its not a brand I am familiar with but I was pleasantly surprised... and for the price these are phenomenal Bluetooth headphones. They are light and I almost forget I am wearing them. They paired with my Samsung S6 Edge and my Macbook w/o any issues.
customer_reviews.author: K. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Budget Headphones....
customer_reviews.text: These headsets are perfect if your not wanting to spend $350 plus on the competition. They fit comfortably over the ear even with glasses. The sound is clear and loud. Bluetooth is also clear. Noise cancellation works perfect. I would recommend them!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne.W

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last very long
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on deployment and only lasted a couple of months. Sound was good, noise cancellation was good, and no issues with the battery life. One side of the headphones, the plastic portion, had broken off. I tried duct taping it best as I could for as long as I could, at least until the end of deployment, and ended up tossing them before I came back. Otherwise, I'd give it a 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Noise over noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: I purchased some time ago. I would not buy again because when using the noise cancellation with bluetooth on I receive electronic sounds that drive me crazy. Sounds are not isolated to one device. Unfortunately I paid $79.00 at the time. My fault for not returning.
customer_reviews.author: eikaun

customer_reviews.title: Not Terrible Headphones
customer_reviews.text: So these headphones are not the worst headphones I have ever used. 1. You get around 5-6 Hours of battery life. Never actually listen to the hours stated on the product, that is for standby time and to attract you to buy the item. 2. The Noise Active Cancelling feature is pretty decent, personally I have 2 dogs and I can still hear them but not as bad without the feature on. If your looking for a wiireless pair of headphones under the $100 price tag then these actually are worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: adam asfa

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had several noise cancelling headphones including Bose and these are every bit as good for a lot less money. I’m replacing my current headphones because I needed Bluetooth. These work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Sharilew

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Coming to Naztech from Platronics...all I can say is "Meh". Everything from sound to durability is mediocre. Cheap feel to the design and my hair keeps getting caught in the ear piece. They aren't the worst headphones I've owned and I'm sure I'll get used to it, but I'm not loving them from the start like I did with the Plantronics.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a plane trip. They were great. Noise cancelling when I needed it, turned off to save battery when I didn't. No problems listening to audiobooks on the plane. Since then, use them while on riding mower. The noise cancelling works nice there too.
customer_reviews.author: mtdow

customer_reviews.title: Great value, amazing packaging and carrying case.
customer_reviews.text: Really good value, nice packaging and product information enclosed in the packaging. The case it comes with is quality, as is the assortment of attachments. Sound quality is really good, and sound cancelling works really well. Would recommend, especially at the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lathamw

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth was easy to connect. Headphones are comfortable. I compared the sound quality of these with my older Bose wired noise-canceling QuietComforts, and I could discern no difference. After using the headphones for a longer period of time, they begin to hurt my ears, which the bose headphones never did. Think twice before going cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, good noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, good noise cancelling. Easy to take calls while listening to music. A little hot wearing outside in the summer. Biggest problem with these is if you don't use them for a week they're dead as a doornail. I see now why a lot of people prefer AA or AAA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: so far I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for two weeks, so far I'm happy with it, the soun is great and the headphones are very nice an confortable. I qualified 4 stars because the ANC is not the best I've tried, I think it needs work improving this feature, but is a great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Juan B. Serrano

customer_reviews.title: worth the price
customer_reviews.text: got this for my son who wanted some sound canceling headphones for Christmas, wasn't going to waste money on bose or beats. for the price these are very good. a friend has bose ones, and these sound similar to those. so for the price well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: D. Galbreath

customer_reviews.title: My Second Pair
customer_reviews.text: After daily use for 2.5 years my Naztech headphones finally bit the dust. I replaced them with the exact same ones. Feels just as comfy as my original pair, might sound even better. So glad these are still around, and they are so good that they have not changed in YEARS. Keep up the good work!
customer_reviews.author: A. B. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Break by looking at them;  crappy return policy
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: at first, I was disappointed in the bluetooth connection with my computer (phone was fine). Then the right side headpiece snapped, after one month of use, for no reason except shoddy manufacturing and design--the plastic just broke so they poke into your head and flop. I tried to duct tape it --to no avail. Then the left side plastic headpiece also snapped. Now I have a useless piece of trash. Note that the return policy is awful: you can't return them after 30 days, even if they don't work.
customer_reviews.author: ScubaSci

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use on a riding mower. I was using ear buds before and had to turn the sound way up. These work great because I can hear the music without having to turn it up really loud. The only problem I'm having is it seems that the mower causes the Bluetooth connection to break up off and on. It doesn't happen all the time, but enough to be frustrating. That is the only reason I gave it three stars. I have used these while vacuuming and they worked great then. Would be great for most purposes except the ridding mower.
customer_reviews.author: Aggie Gal

product_meta.title: Naztech i9 Wireless Active Noise Cancelling 4.1 Bluetooth Headphones with in-line Microphone Up to 30 hrs Playtime for iPhones, Smartphones, Tablets, Computers, TV and Work/Airplane Adapter Included
product_meta.description:
"Naztech: A World Leader in Professional Sound System Technology, Designed in California 

 * A Trusted American Brand.
 * All products are performance tested and vetted through our rigorous quality inspection process to ensure reliability.

Naztech i9 Active Noise Cancelling Headphones  * HD Sound. Active Noise Cancelling. Bluetooth Connectivity.
 * Universally compatible with all of your devices, including PCs and Macs / iPhones and iPads / Android smartphones and tablets.
 * Automatically indicates the remaining battery life of the Bluetooth device on your iOS screen! 

Ultra HD Sound
HD sound from 40mm neodymium drivers with enhanced Bluetooth CSR v4.1 connectivity for a concert-like experience. 

Active Noise Cancelling
Noisehush Technology effectively detects and removes up to 90% of distracting ambient sound for the most immersive listening. 

Bluetooth Headphones
Enjoy seamless wireless connectivity from these Bluetooth version 4.1 headphones 

In-Line Noise Cancelling Microphone
Features a noise cancelling microphone to make sure that your voice comes through crisply and clearly. 

Soft as a Pillow
Cloud-like comfort from over ear memory foam cups with genuine, cooling leather. 

Gold Plated Connectors for Crisp, Clear Sound
Both gold plated stereo and airplane connectors included for enhanced conductivity and connectivity. 

Tangle-Free Braided Cable Included
Long lasting, tangle preventing, frustration-free cable. 

Extended Lithium-Ion Battery
Up to 15 hours of uninterrupted wireless/active noise cancelling playtime with on-screen iOS battery life indicators. 

Hard Case Included
Provides a hard shell to protect your headphones with travelling compartments for all of the included accessories.

24 Month Warranty
Naztech gives you peace of mind by providing you with an extended 24 month warranty, a 12 month manufacturer's warranty and a 12 month extended warranty only for Amazon customers! 
" INFORMATION : NOTE: The i9 needs to be fully charged before first use. ANC is battery powered, so if the headphones are out of power, they will need to be recharged before ANC can be used. Signal strength is influenced by a number of factors: the range is 10 unobstructed meters. Walls and doors tend to block or disrupt the connection resulting in skipping or a total loss of signal. Also, if there are other wireless devices that are actively in use within the area, they tend to disrupt each other’s signal.
feature_bullets: Superior battery life- built-in rechargeable li-polymer battery
Continues audio even after battery Depletes
Foldable for portability and travel case for storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars952 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
